Published November 9 2014

Office hours

Office hours — The season of consumers demanding free software is officially upon us: all Office apps are now free on iOS. As of this writing, Word, Excel, and PowerPoint are #1, #2, and #3 on the Top Free Chart respectively.

Enjoy your day.
